sen.j: 日本の絵の具（にほんのえのぐ）は、伝統的な日本画に使われる材料の一覧。
sen.e: Japanese pigments are a catalog of the materials used in Japanese traditional painting.
Japanese pigments are materials used in Japanese traditional painting.
sen.cmt: The Japanese doesn't seem to make a lot of sense to me. Perhaps the writer forgot to delete "の一覧" when editing the sentence? It the translator comes across a Japanese sentence that doesn't seem to make much sense, it would be helpful if he/she could leave a comment to that effect.
sen.e: Japanese pigments are materials used in Japanese traditional painting.

sen.j: 顔料、染料
sen.e: Pigments or Dyes
Pigments or Dyes
Pigments or Dyes

sen.j: 鉱物を磨り潰して粉末にした天然岩絵具、色ガラス粉末の合成岩絵具、胡粉等を染料で着色した泥絵具等がある。
sen.e: There are several kinds of pigments including natural mineral pigments made from powdered minerals, synthetic mineral pigments made from colored glass powder, and mud pigments made from colored whitewash or other materials.
sen.cmt: 他の単語とのバランスを考慮して、「泥絵具」は"doro enogu"とはせずに、"mud pigments"としました。
sen.e: Several kinds of pigments are used in Japanese painting, including natural mineral pigments made from powdered minerals, synthetic mineral pigments made from colored glass powder, and mud pigments made from colored whitewash or other materials.

Several kinds of pigments are used in Japanese painting, including natural mineral pigments made from powdered minerals, synthetic mineral pigments made from colored glass powder, and mud pigments made from colored whitewash or other materials.

sen.j: 岩絵具を参照。
sen.e: Please refer to the item "Mineral Pigments" for details.
Please refer to the section on "Mineral Pigments" for further details.
Please refer to the section on Mineral Pigments for further details.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを削除しました。

sen.j: 天然の鉱物から製造する顔料。
sen.e: Pigments of mineral origin are produced from natural minerals.
Pigments of mineral origin are produced from natural minerals.
Pigments of mineral origin are produced from natural minerals.

sen.j: 多く非常に高価。
sen.e: Many of them are very expensive.
Many of them are very expensive.
Many of them are very expensive.

sen.j: 岩群青：藍銅鉱を粉末にしたもので、紫青色を呈する。
sen.e: "Iwagunjo" is a pigment made from pulverized azurite, and exhibits purplish blue.
"Iwagunjo" is a pigment made from pulverized azurite, which has a purplish blue color.
Iwagunjo: A pigment made from pulverized azurite, which has a purplish blue color.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: 暗い色合いのものから順に紺青、群青、白群と呼ぶ。
sen.e: The pigment is classified in order of color depth under different names such as "konjo" (Prussian blue), "gunjo" (ultramarine blue) and "byakugun" (pastel blue).
sen.cmt: 「群青」の説明を、"deep blue sea color"ではなく、"ultramarine blue"としました。
sen.e: Pigment is classified in order of color depth under different names such as "konjo" (Prussian blue), "gunjo" (ultramarine blue), and "byakugun" (pastel blue).
The pigment is classified in order of color depth under different names such as konjo (Prussian blue), gunjo (ultramarine blue), and byakugun (pastel blue).

sen.j: 岩緑青：孔雀石を粉末にしたもの。
sen.e: "Iwarokusho" (malachite green) is a pigment made from powdered malachite.
"Iwarokusho" (malachite green) is a pigment made from powdered malachite.
Iwarokusho (malachite green): A pigment made from powdered malachite.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: 粒子の細かいものは白緑と呼ばれる。
sen.e: The fine-grained one is called "byakuroku" (whitish green).
Fine-grained iwarokusho is called "byakuroku" (whitish green).
Fine-grained iwarokusho is called byakuroku (whitish green).
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを削除しました。

sen.j: 緑色。
sen.e: The pigment exhibits green.
This pigment exhibits green.
This pigment exhibits green.

sen.j: 緑青：銅の酸化で生じる緑色の粉末。
sen.e: Verdigris (copper rust) is green powder created by the oxidation of copper.
Verdigris (copper rust) is green powder created by the oxidation of copper.
Verdigris (copper rust): A pigment in green powder created by the oxidation of copper.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: 辰砂：朱。
sen.e: Cinnabar is also known as vermilion.
Cinnabar is also known as vermilion.
Cinnabar: Also known as vermilion.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: 硫化水銀の粉末で、古代から魔除けに使われていた。
sen.e: The pigment, powdered mercury sulfide, has been used as a charm against evil since ancient times.
This pigment, powdered mercury sulfide, has been used as a charm against evil since ancient times.
This pigment, powdered mercury sulfide, has been used as a charm against evil since ancient times.

sen.j: 帯黄赤色。
sen.e: The pigment exhibits yellowish red.
This pigment exhibits yellowish red.
This pigment exhibits yellowish red.

sen.j: 黄土：黄土原鉱の粉末で、黄褐色。
sen.e: Ocher is powder of ocher ore, and exhibits yellowish brown.
Ocher is powder of ocher ore, and exhibits yellowish brown.
Ocher: A pigment in powder of ocher ore, and exhibits yellowish brown.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: 石黄：岩黄、雄黄とも言う。
sen.e: Orpiment is also known as arsenious sulfide.
Orpiment is also known as arsenious sulfide.
Orpiment: Also known as arsenious sulfide.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: 明るい黄色。
sen.e: It exhibits bright yellow.
It exhibits bright yellow.
It exhibits bright yellow.

sen.j: 有毒。
sen.e: The pigment is poisonous.
This pigment is poisonous.
It is poisonous.

sen.j: 赤味の強いものは雌黄とも呼び、藤黄と混同される。
sen.e: The reddish one is also called garcinia cambogia, and it is often confused with "touou" (cambogia).
The reddish type is also called garcinia cambogia, and it is often confused with "touou" (cambogia).
The reddish type is also called shio (garcinia cambogia), and it is often confused with to-o (cambogia).

sen.j: 人体への害は少ないものが主に使われる。
sen.e: Pigments of plant origin are mainly made from materials harmless to human bodies.
Pigments of plant origin are mainly made from materials that are harmless to human bodies.
Pigments of plant origin are mainly made from materials that are harmless to human bodies.

sen.j: 青黛や艶紅など、化粧品として使われたものも多い。
sen.e: Many of them, including "seitai" (a blue pigment made from indigos) and "tsuya-beni" (a red pigment made from safflowers,) were used as cosmetics.
Many of them, including "seitai" (a blue pigment made from indigos) and "tsuya-beni" (a red pigment made from safflowers,) were once used as cosmetics.
Many of them, including seitai (a blue pigment made from indigos) and tsuya-beni (a red pigment made from safflowers), were once used as cosmetics.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを削除するなどしました。

sen.j: 艶紅：紅花の色素を沈殿させたもの。
sen.e: "Tsuya-beni" is a precipitate of safflower pigment.
"Tsuya-beni" is a precipitate of safflower pigment.
Tsuya-beni: A precipitate of safflower pigment.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: 紫系の赤。
sen.e: It exhibits purplish red.
It exhibits purplish red.
It exhibits purplish red.

sen.j: 陶器に塗りつけておいて保存した。
sen.e: The pigment was daubed on pieces of earthenware and preserved.
The pigment was daubed on pieces of earthenware and preserved.
The pigment was daubed on pieces of earthenware and preserved.

sen.j: 古くは口紅としても使われていた。
sen.e: It is also used as lip rouge in ancient times.
It is also used as lip rouge in ancient times.
It is also used as lip rouge in ancient times.

sen.j: 青黛：アイ (植物)の青色色素。
sen.e: "Seitai" is a blue pigment made from indigos.
"Seitai" is a blue pigment made from indigos.
Seitai: A blue pigment made from indigos.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: インジゴ。
sen.e: It is also known as indigo.
It is also known as indigo.
It is also known as indigo.

sen.j: 蘇芳：蘇芳由来の色素で赤紫。
sen.e: "Suo" is a pigment which originates from sappanwood, and exhibits reddish purple.
"Suo" is a pigment that originates from sappanwood, and exhibits reddish purple.
Suo: A pigment that originates from sappanwood, and exhibits reddish purple.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: 艶紅と色や使い方が似ている。
sen.e: The pigment is similar in color and usage to "tsuya-beni."
This pigment is similar in color and usage to "tsuya-beni."
This pigment is similar in color and usage to tsuya-beni.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを削除しました。

sen.j: 藤黄：オトギリソウ科植物の樹脂からとったもので、赤味の黄。
sen.e: "Touou" (cambogia) is a pigment extracted from resin of Guttiferae plants, and exhibits reddish yellow.
"Touou" (cambogia) is a pigment extracted from resin of Guttiferae plants, and exhibits reddish yellow.
To-o (cambogia): A pigment extracted from resin of Guttiferae plants, and exhibits reddish yellow.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用し表記を変えました。

sen.j: 油煙：植物油の煤、黒色を呈する。
sen.e: Smoke black is a pigment made from soot of plant oil, and exhibits black.
Smoke black is a pigment made from soot of plant oil, and exhibits black.
Smoke black: A pigment made from soot of plant oil, and exhibits black.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: ニカワを固着材として用いたものに墨がある。
sen.e: "Sumi" (cake ink) is made from smoke black solidified with glue.
"Sumi" (cake ink) is made from smoke black solidified with glue.
Sumi (cake ink) is made from smoke black solidified with glue.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを削除しました。

sen.j: 動物由来
sen.e: Pigments of Animal Origin
Pigments of Animal Origin
Pigments of Animal Origin

sen.j: 珊瑚：アカサンゴの粉末で、淡赤色。
sen.e: Coral is powder of red coral, and exhibits pink.
Coral is powder of red coral, and exhibits pink.
Coral: Powder of red coral, and exhibits pink.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: サンゴは装飾品にも使われ、高価。
sen.e: Coral is also used as accessories, and therefore expensive.
Coral is also used as accessories, and therefore expensive.
Coral is also used as accessories, and therefore expensive.

sen.j: 胡粉：もとは鉛の化合物を使ったが、現在はハマグリの貝殻を削ったもので、白色を呈する。
sen.e: Whitewash was originally made from lead compounds, but now it is made from shaved clamshell, and exhibits white.
Whitewash was originally made from lead compounds, but now it is made from shaved clamshell, and exhibits white.
Whitewash: Originally made from lead compounds, but now it is made from shaved clamshell, and exhibits white.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。

sen.j: 生臙脂：コチニールカイガラムシの抽出物で、赤色を呈する。
sen.e: Cochineal is a pigment made from an extract of cochineal insects, and exhibits red.
Cochineal is a pigment made from an extract of cochineal insects, and exhibits red.
Cochineal: A pigment made from an extract of cochineal insects, and exhibits red.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。
